summary: Diff evidence is truncated for StudyPlannerPage, so the requested UI restorations cannot be verified as implemented. The accompanying summary file describes multiple changes, including several behaviors/features not requested (and some that appear to violate the UI-only constraint).

missing_requirements.requirement: Keep the existing Study Planner progress bar exactly as-is (no restyle/move), directly below the task panel heading and directly above the task list, with percentage text.
missing_requirements.reason: StudyPlannerPage.tsx diff is truncated before the relevant header/progress bar markup; the diff summary does not show the actual JSX/CSS ensuring position/unchanged styling.

missing_requirements.requirement: Group ALL action buttons (Sort by Date & Time/Default, Clear, Download TXT, Download PDF) together top-right in a single row in the task list CardHeader; none elsewhere; no label/icon changes.
missing_requirements.reason: Truncated StudyPlannerPage.tsx does not show the CardHeader/button layout, so grouping/placement and exact labels/icons cannot be confirmed from the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove large/filled background colors from each task card; use neutral/light default card background; subject color only as small pill Subject badge; priority only as small badge.
missing_requirements.reason: Task card JSX/styles are not visible in the truncated StudyPlannerPage.tsx diff; cannot confirm removal of colored backgrounds or confinement of color to badges only.

missing_requirements.requirement: Restore compact task card layout: checkbox left; subject+badges; topic; small duration + date/time text; delete (trash) icon right; no redesign/expand/emphasis.
missing_requirements.reason: Truncated StudyPlannerPage.tsx does not include the task row/card render, so structure/alignment and absence of expandable UI cannot be verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Global UI constraints: do not move Daily/Weekly toggle; do not change Add Task form; only minimal spacing/alignment changes; no animations; no new styling patterns.
missing_requirements.reason: Truncated StudyPlannerPage.tsx prevents verifying whether the toggle/form were left untouched and whether any new styling/animations were introduced.

hallucinated_features.description: Extended duration options up to 6 hours.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested (non-goal: no new Study Planner features/new fields). This appears as a functional/content expansion beyond UI restoration.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/StudyPlannerPage.tsx (DURATIONS array includes values up to '6 hours')

hallucinated_features.description: Enhanced validation with duplicate submission prevention in guest mode.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and appears to change frontend business logic/behavior (explicit constraint: UI correction only; do not change frontend business logic).
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions 'enhanced validation with duplicate submission prevention in guest mode')

hallucinated_features.description: Fixed-height scrollable task list container (max-h-[500px] with overflow-y-auto).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; could be considered a layout/styling change beyond what is strictly necessary to restore the specified original layout.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions 'fixed-height scrollable task list container (max-h-[500px] with overflow-y-auto)')

hallucinated_features.description: Real-time updating visual progress percentage bar tied to checking/unchecking/adding/deleting tasks.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and implies behavior changes; requirement was to keep the existing progress bar exactly as-is (no restyle/move), and constraints disallow logic changes.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions progress bar 'updates in real time when tasks are checked, unchecked, added, or deleted')
